examples.example: 生活中总有一些不如意，但我们要保持一颗乐观向上的心。

translate.english: There are always some disappointments in life, but we should keep an optimistic and upward heart.

examples.example: 每一天我都以积极的态度去迎接新的挑战。

translate.english: Every day I meet new challenges with a positive attitude.

examples.example: 我一定会努力实现自己的梦想。

translate.english: I will definitely strive to realize my own dream.
